description: Indicates if the file is REFRESHED or UPDATED; literally “REFRESHED” or “UPDATED”
Literally “A”; indicates the end of the header record
RECORD ID SEQUENCE NUMBER; begins with “00000001”
ACCOUNT NUMBER, including Office (3) and Base (6)

TRANSACTION TYPE; values include:
“X” or “ ”= Unchanged account
“A” = Add new account
“C” = Change to existing record

AUTO-TITLED or USER-TITLED ACCOUNT; values include:
“F” = Auto-Titled
“S” = User-Titled (opened in PONA or through conversion)

ACCOUNT TYPE CODE; values include:
“C” = DVP/RVP
“R” = Retail
“T” = Retirement
“3” = Retail Third Party as Custodian
“4” = 401(k) Self-Directed
REGISTRATION TYPE; for Account Services only; see Appendix Q, “ACCT Codes and Values”
NUMBER OF ACCOUNT TITLE LINES IN REGISTRATION LINES (values 1, 2, 3, 4)
